item.title: 浑水公司发布做空报告后，AppLovin 股价下跌
item.description: 在浑水公司（Muddy Waters）发布针对 AppLovin 公司的利空报告后，该公司股价周四迅速暴跌 13%。【原文：AppLovin Corp. shares quickly tumbled as much as 13% Thursday after Muddy Waters issued a short report against the company.】

item.title: 心灵感应录影带》的创作者 "刚刚收支平衡"，尽管病毒式传播大获成功
item.description:
心灵感应磁带 吸引了包括乔-罗根在内的许多美国人的注意，但通过有限的播客系列赚钱仍然困难重重

。【原文：

The Telepathy Tapes has captured the attention of many Americans, including Joe Rogan, but making money on limited podcast series remains difficult

】

item.title: 随着特朗普关税政策的升温，墨西哥将失去什么？
item.description: 与美国的全面关税战可能会给已经在与经济放缓作斗争的墨西哥一记重拳。拉美第二大经济体在很大程度上依赖于与北方邻国的商业关系。【原文：A full-blown tariff war with the US could prove a gut punch for Mexico, which is already battling an economic slowdown. Latin America’s second-biggest economy depends heavily on its commercial relationship with its northern neighbor — its top trading partner by a wide margin.】

item.title: 阿根廷要求提前获得国际货币基金组织 200 亿美元协议的大部分资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿根廷正在寻求一笔预付款，这笔款项占其与国际货币基金组织未来 200 亿美元计划的一大部分，目前谈判的重点是付款的规模和时间。【原文：Argentina is seeking an upfront payment representing a large portion of its future $20 billion program with the International Monetary Fund, as negotiations now focus on the size and timing of disbursements, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 现金阿森纳让埃尔多安度过多年来最严重的危机
item.description: 土耳其在过去一年中重建了枯竭的外汇储备，加强了金融缓冲，事实证明，这在应对市场动荡方面至关重要。【原文：Turkey spent the past year rebuilding its depleted foreign-exchange reserves, fortifying a financial buffer that has proven critical in navigating market turbulence.】

item.title: 德国动荡的经济复苏面临汽车关税风险
item.description: 据彭博经济报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普决定对所有进口到美国的汽车征收 25% 的关税，这将危及德国从多年停滞中复苏。【原文：President Donald Trump’s decision to slap 25% tariffs on all auto imports into the US is jeopardizing Germany’s recovery from years of stagnation, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 淘金热重返新西兰历史悠久的矿业小镇
item.description:
淘金热过去约 150 年后，矿工们又回到了新西兰的里夫顿镇，他们打赌该镇名称由来的含金石英 "礁石 "的深度远远超过了老人们的想象。【原文：

Some 150 years after the gold rush, miners are back in the New Zealand town of Reefton, betting the gold-laden “reefs” of quartz that give the town its name run much deeper than the old timers could go. 

】

item.title: 鲁比奥警告委内瑞拉不要攻击圭亚那和埃克森公司
item.description: 美国国务卿马可-鲁比奥警告委内瑞拉，任何入侵圭亚那或威胁埃克森美孚公司在该国业务的企图都将是 "非常糟糕的举动"。【原文：US Secretary of State Marco Rubio warned Venezuela that any attempt to invade Guyana or threaten Exxon Mobil Corp.’s operations in the country would be a “very bad move.”】

item.title: Blackstone 收购的合规技术公司 ISN 酝酿 60 亿美元出售计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，ISN 软件公司正在探索包括出售在内的各种方案，该合规软件公司的估值可能达到 60 亿美元或更高，其中包括债务。【原文：ISN Software Corp. is exploring options including a sale that could value the compliance software firm at $6 billion or more including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行选择阿克拉姆接替詹姆斯-冯-莫尔特克担任首席财务官
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）表示，拉贾-阿克拉姆（Raja Akram）将于今年晚些时候接替首席财务官詹姆斯-冯-莫尔特克（James von Moltke），这是德国最大银行领导层一系列变动的一部分。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG said Raja Akram will replace Chief Financial Officer James von Moltke later this year as part of raft of leadership changes at Germany’s largest bank.】

item.title: 加拿大保守党的避税计划为多伦多股市带来潜在利好
item.description: 加拿大保守党在大选中承诺，允许个人对国内公司的部分投资免征所得税，这一承诺在多伦多金融区受到好评。【原文：An election promise by Canada’s Conservative Party that would allow individuals to avoid income taxes on some investments in domestic companies is being lauded in Toronto’s financial district.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉货币因特朗普关税抑制石油销售而崩溃
item.description: 委内瑞拉人正在抢购美元，使当地货币跌至历史最低点，因为人们越来越担心特朗普政府正在扼杀该国的石油工业，使经济重新陷入危机。【原文：Venezuelans are snapping up dollars, sending the local currency crashing to record lows as concern mounts that the Trump administration is throttling the country’s oil industry and tipping the economy back into crisis.】

item.title: 废止免税政策引发担忧，市政债券走势疲软
item.description: 本周市政债券遭到抛售，导致州和地方政府的债务比美国国债便宜。【原文：Municipal bonds are selling off this week, causing state and local government debt to cheapen compared to US Treasuries.】

item.title: 法国国家银行 Bpifrance 启动价值 2700 万美元的加密货币基金
item.description: 法国投资银行 Bpifrance 表示，它将启动一项 2,500 万欧元（2,700 万美元）的加密货币风险投资战略，直接投资于数字资产，作为对新兴行业更广泛支持战略的一部分。【原文：French investment bank Bpifrance said it’s launching a €25 million ($27 million) cryptocurrency venture strategy to invest directly in digital assets as part of a broader support strategy for the nascent sector.】

item.title: 南非央行行长称过高的 CPI 目标会带来代价
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-卡冈亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）认为，将南非的通胀目标维持在目前的范围内将使政府付出高昂的代价，他长期以来一直主张降低通胀目标。【原文：Keeping South Africa’s inflation target at the current range will be costly for the government, according to central bank chief Lesetja Kganyago, who has long been an advocate of lowering the objective.】

item.title: 育碧分拆顶级游戏部门，腾讯将获 25% 股份
item.description: 育碧娱乐公司（Ubisoft Entertainment SA）将把包括《刺客信条》（Assassin's Creed）、《远征》（Far Cry）和汤姆-克兰西（Tom Clancy）的《彩虹六号》（Rainbow Six）在内的一个部门分拆成一家企业价值约为 40 亿欧元（43 亿美元）的子公司。【原文：Ubisoft Entertainment SA will carve out a unit including Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry and Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six into a subsidiary with an enterprise value of about €4 billion ($4.3 billion).】

item.title: 美国施压，委内瑞拉石油大量流入中国
item.description: 在特朗普政府部署制裁和二次关税以挤压这个拉美国家之际，委内瑞拉正在增加对中国的石油出口，达到近两年来的最高水平。【原文：Venezuela is boosting oil exports to China to the highest in almost two years as the Trump administration deploys sanctions and secondary tariffs to squeeze the Latin American nation.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国有石油巨头为拖延已久的首次公开募股寻找顾问
item.description: 尼日利亚国家石油公司正在国际和本地市场寻求顾问，为拖延已久的首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Nigeria’s state oil company is courting international and local markets for advisers as it prepares for a long-delayed initial public offering.】

item.title: 关税即将实施，汽车制造商在美国高档车市场上步履维艰
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对汽车进口征收 25% 的关税并警告未来将爆发更广泛的贸易战之后，汽车制造商的债券周四在美国债市走弱。【原文：Automakers’ bonds weakened in US debt markets on Thursday after President Donald Trump slapped 25% tariffs on car imports and warned of a broader trade war ahead.】

item.title: 德意志银行称美联储支持担忧可能威胁美元
item.description: 据德意志银行称，美联储提供的久经考验的流动性支持一旦撤销，美元作为储备货币的地位将面临二战结束以来最大的风险。【原文：The withdrawal of a time-tested liquidity backstop offered by the Federal Reserve would represent the greatest risk to the dollar’s status as a reserve currency since the end of World War II, according to Deutsche Bank.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率微跌，30 年期平均利率降至 6.65
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率三周来首次下降。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US fell for the first time in three weeks.】

item.title: 巴黎机场运营商称昂贵机票将冲击需求
item.description: 巴黎主要机场的运营商预计，未来几年机票价格将上涨，以补偿昂贵的替代航空燃料的使用，从而影响到世界上最受欢迎的旅游目的地的旅游需求。【原文：The operator of the main Paris airports predicted an increase in air fares in coming years to compensate for the use of expensive alternative aviation fuel, weighing on travel demand into the world’s most popular tourist destination.】

item.title: 德国部长称特朗普关税不得削弱欧盟绿色目标
item.description: 即将离任的德国环境部长表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将对汽车进口征收 25% 的关税后，欧盟必须抵制为帮助汽车制造商而削弱气候目标的压力。【原文：The European Union must resist pressure to weaken climate targets in order to aid carmakers after US President Donald Trump said he would slap a 25% tariff on auto imports, Germany’s outgoing environment minister said.】

item.title: 需求放缓，意大利奢侈品供应商计划与债权人谈判
item.description: 随着高端商品消费的下降，奢侈品供应商 Altofare 集团正准备与债权人展开债务谈判。【原文：Luxury supplier Altofare Group is preparing to kick off debt talks with its creditors as spending on high-end goods declines.】

item.title: 特朗普计划如何利用 "二次关税 "惩罚委内瑞拉石油进口商
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将关税视为经济政策和外交的核心工具，并创造性地提出了如何征收进口税的建议。其中一个例子是他计划征收所谓的互惠关税，即针对每个贸易伙伴定制的新关税，目的是抵消其任何被认为使美国出口商处于不利地位的做法。另一个例子是：他威胁要对来自以下国家的进口商品征收所谓的二级关税【原文：Having embraced tariffs as a central tool of both economic policy and diplomacy, US President Donald Trump has been creative with his proposals on how to deploy the import taxes. One example is his plan to impose so-called reciprocal tariffs — new duties to be customized for each trading partner with the aim of offsetting any of its practices deemed to put American exporters at a disadvantage. Another example: he’s threatened to impose what he’s calling secondary tariffs on imports from countrie】

item.title: 匈牙利迫使机构投资者增加债券购买量
item.description: 在收益率上升增加了本已捉襟见肘的预算的融资成本之后，匈牙利公布了迫使机构投资者增加购买地方债券的新规定。【原文：Hungary unveiled new rules forcing institutional investors to boost local bond purchases after rising yields increased financing costs for an already stretched budget.】

item.title: 纳米比亚将在当地筹集资金偿还 7.5 亿美元欧洲债券
item.description: 纳米比亚财政部长埃丽卡-沙福达（Ericah Shafudah）在预算报告中表示，纳米比亚将在当地筹集资金，以偿还将于10月29日到期的7.5亿美元欧元债券。【原文：Namibia will raise funds locally to repay its $750 million eurobond that’s maturing on Oct. 29, Finance Minister Ericah Shafudah said in her budget speech.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称美国经济放缓但未预测衰退
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）认为，随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推进激进的关税政策，美国经济今年将进入低速增长阶段，但并没有看到经济衰退的曙光。【原文：The International Monetary Fund sees the US economy shifting into a lower gear this year as President Donald Trump pushes forward with aggressive tariffs but doesn’t see a recession on the horizon.】

item.title: 向石油区的 "无，宝贝，无 "问好
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚财政部长希望大幅降息
item.description: 哥伦比亚即将上任的财政部长赫尔曼-阿维拉（Germán Ávila）表示，最近的利率决定 "过于温和"，并呼吁采取 "更加积极的 "货币宽松政策。【原文：Colombia’s incoming finance minister Germán Ávila said recent interest rate decisions have been “too moderate” and called for “much more aggressive” monetary easing.】
